General.Name: JNK Heaters Co. Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: JNK Heaters Co., Ltd. engages in the design, fabrication, erection, maintenance, and revamping of process fired heaters and furnaces in South Korea and internationally. The company provides process fired heaters, such as crude distillation unit heaters, vacuum distillation unit heaters, UOP CCR platforming/AXENS aromizing heaters, pyrolysis furnaces, steam reformers, steam super heaters, lube base oil heaters, olefins conversion unit heaters, and other heaters; and hydrotreater heaters, catalytic reforming and hydro desulfurization heaters, hydro cracker heaters, steam/hydrogen reformers, and reboilers. It also operates hydrogen-refueling station. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
